description:
A few people have asked for the re-broadcast of Troi's Live show. He has such a sexy voice and was really good at answering questions, but also stroking his cock.
I really wanted to get it online, but I had some technical difficulties with the archived file of the broadcast.
I tried out a new USB microphone that would sit closer to the model. They often have to move pretty far back in order to get a even a head-to-torso shot. So I thought that would improve the quality of the audio and they would not sound like they had moved to the room next door.
The live show did sound better, but throughout. I could hear some little audio glitches as if the microphone was cutting out.
Turns out those glitches made it nearly impossible to import and then export the various sizes and formats.
Every sound hitch would move the audio off a bit, and even though I could move the audio around on the timeline, just 30 seconds later the audio would be out of sync.
After weeks of messing with it, we finally got it figured out. Lesson learned, use the on camera microphone!
Anyway, I hope you enjoy getting to know Troi a bit better. The guys that showed up to chat with him were thrilled and impressed, so I think it is worth you giving it a gander!
title: Troi - Live! 08-12-15
